scripts.dev: concurrently "cd auth-service && yarn dev" "cd notification-service && yarn dev" "cd restaurant-service && yarn dev" "cd cart-service && yarn dev" "cd order-service && yarn dev" "cd delivery-service && yarn dev" "cd driver-service && yarn dev" "cd payment-service && yarn dev" "cd api-gateway && yarn dev"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd auth-service && yarn install" "cd notification-service && yarn install" "cd restaurant-service && yarn install" "cd cart-service && yarn install" "cd order-service && yarn install" "cd delivery-service && yarn install" "cd driver-service && yarn install"  "cd payment-service && yarn install" "cd api-gateway && yarn install"
